title: 美國國會作證學者Dan Garrett 被拒入境

replies.msg:
https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/09/28/academic-dan-garrett-banned-hong-kong-testifying-citys-rights-situation-us/

節錄:

The author, photographer and political scientist said that he was denied entry ahead of the upcoming Umbrella Movement anniversary and National Day holiday for unspecified “immigration reasons.”

He told HKFP that he was visiting to work on a book project and add to several ongoing documentary projects: “It’s always been a risk. Now its a reality. I was planning on visiting with friends, talk to some academic colleagues, some shopping, photographing and observing key anniversaries and the changing visual culture of the city and its protest culture.”
Garrett said he felt the move was politically motivated, as he challenged the immigration officer during his four-hours of questioning: “When asked for examples of normal violations, he described a failure to provide proof of a return ticket, no hotel bookings, inadequate funds – all factors which I pointed out to him were not applicable in my case as I had provided evidence of each.

Nevertheless, he stated that it was an internal Immigration Department decision and they didn’t have to provide a ‘reason’ or explanation.”
